title: refactor: enabling partial TDS application on partial invoice (backport #41685)
body:
Consider a scenario where a Purchase Order has TDS applied, even though Supplier master doesn't have TDS set. On such cases, making a Partial Purchase Invoice against that PO fetched the full TDS amount from PO. This is incorrect.

By making `Apply Tax Withholding Amount` checkbox editable on such scenarios, users can make partial purchase invoice with TDS applied only for that partial amount.<hr>This is an automatic backport of pull request #41685 done by [Mergify](https://mergify.com).

- When the user initiates the asset purchase cycle by creating a purchase order and subsequently generates a purchase receipt and a purchase invoice from it, the same account is debited twice in the General Ledger.
- Also when purchase receipt is created from purchase invoice expense is already booked still another entry gets created which should not be.
- The lack of proper linkage between the purchase receipt and the purchase invoice leads to duplicate debits in the GL.

title: refactor: allow foreign currency advance accounts
body:
extends: https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/pull/35609

Advance accounts can be in either: Customer Billing currency or Company default currency.

Consider a customer with billing currency: USD and a company default billing currency: INR. Below configurations are allowed and supported,

| Receivable/Payable Account Currency | Advance Payment Account currency | Allowed |
|-|-|-|
| INR              | USD                              | No      |
| USD              | INR                              | No      |
| INR              | INR                              | Yes     |
| USD              | USD                              | Yes     |


Validations are added to enforce this.
author: ruthra-kumar

title: fix: Item-wise Sales and Purchase register with no item codes #41373 (backport #41424)
body:
1. There was a mismatch in the Sales Register and Item-wise Sales Register Report as the Sales Invoices which does not have the item codes in the Sales Invoice Item table were not displaying in the item-wise Sales Register.


Screenshot for the Sales Register:
![SR](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/assets/27720465/6e45f908-5c5a-40bd-8702-7c7284c12e0c)


**Screenshots for the Item-wise Sales Register**
Before:
![Item-wise_SR_Before](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/assets/27720465/621a37d7-4046-4ba3-8267-7068147ce294)
After:
Now the Item-wise Sales Register Displays the Sales Invoices which does not have the Item Code.
![Item-wise_SR_After](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/assets/27720465/cdea6a49-12af-4299-a311-8940538483b3)


2. There was a mismatch in the Purchase Register and Item-wise Purchase Register Report as the Purchase  Invoices which does not have the item codes were not displaying in the item-wise Purchase Register.


Screenshot for the Purchase Register:
![Purchase Register](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/assets/27720465/39565ef3-f105-45c9-ae90-513ae749884e)



**Screenshots for the Item-wise Purchase Register**
Before:
![Item-wise-PR_before](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/assets/27720465/f5c4c408-e53c-4d4c-ab93-2351380298e2)


After:
Now the Item-wise Purchase Register Displays the Purchase Invoices which does not have the Item Code.
![Item-wise_PR_After](https://github.com/frappe/erpnext/assets/27720465/2562b727-4b00-4673-87bf-30f395282126)

Next change:
Dunning is saved just in case if here is status changing.
